definitions: To suspend or be suspended from above with the lower part free.
To kill by suspending from a rope.
To attach or be attached to a wall or other surface.
To remain in the air; to float.
To spend time idly or aimlessly.
examples: You hang the picture on the wall.
You hang out with your friends every weekend.
You hang your coat in the closet.
You hang on every word she says.
You hang in there, it will get better.
